modName: The legend of Ragnar the Red
summary:
There once was a hero named Ragnar the Red,...
But nobody knows the Thalmor didn't nly wake Alduin...
descriptionHtml:
There once was a hero named Ragnar the Red......His ugly red head rolled around on the floor.
Everybody knows this story.
But nobody knows the Thalmor didn't only wake Alduin...

he is here...
he is alive...
he is red...
he is living in Markath...
And he is furious on the dragonborn who helped Mathilda!

this mod adds a new worldboss named Ragnar the Red.

Mathilda is to be found in Rorikstead
author: Zep2000
